ESPublicQuery.SQL:
SELECT FK_ESFITradeAccount_ESFISalesPersons.Name AS Name, ESFITradeAccount.fSalesPersonGID AS fSalesPersonGID, Count(ESFITradeAccount.Code) AS Code FROM ESFITradeAccount AS ESFITradeAccount LEFT JOIN ESFISalesPerson AS FK_ESFITradeAccount_ESFISalesPersons ON ESFITradeAccount.fSalesPersonGID = FK_ESFITradeAccount_ESFISalesPersons.GID WHERE (ESFITradeAccount.fCompanyCode = ##(ESCOMPANY))
GROUP BY FK_ESFITradeAccount_ESFISalesPersons.Name, ESFITradeAccount.fSalesPersonGID, ESFITradeAccount.fCompanyCode
